name: Java Scrabble
description:
This Scrabble Java game was developed by a french team of 3 students in computer science degree.

This game is fully available in French, English, and partially in Spanish.

You can contribute to translations at http://scrabble.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project?id=359797

This game allows you to:

  • Play on your computer against it
  • Play with friends on the same computer
  • Play with friends through the local network (LAN)

To place a tile, just click on it and then click on the board.

Tiles art by Laura Dailhau https://lauradailhau.wordpress.com/

Source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/Harfeur/Scrabble
